name: Arijit Singh
bio: Arijit Singh is an Indian playback singer and music composer. He is best known for his soulful and romantic songs.

name: Atif Aslam
bio: Atif Aslam is a Pakistani playback singer, songwriter, and actor. He has recorded numerous chart-topping songs in both Pakistan and India.

name: Pritam
bio: Pritam Chakraborty, popularly known as Pritam, is an Indian music director, composer, and singer.

name: Neha Kakkar
bio: Neha Kakkar is an Indian playback singer who has won several awards for her high-energy dance tracks and romantic songs.

name: Tulsi Kumar
bio: Tulsi Kumar is an Indian playback singer and entrepreneur, known for her contributions to Bollywood music.

name: Sachin-Jigar
bio: Sachin-Jigar is an Indian music composer duo from Mumbai, India, consisting of Sachin Sanghvi and Jigar Saraiya.

name: Sachet Tandon
bio: Sachet Tandon is an Indian singer and music composer known for his hits like 'Bekhayali' from Kabir Singh.

name: Anirudh
bio: Anirudh Ravichander is an Indian music composer and singer who works primarily in Tamil cinema.

name: Krish Mandal
bio: Krish Mandal is a rising artist in the Indian music scene, known for his unique vocal texture.
